text: 7:5 Dɨboboniba 18:21E fo, Livain ovaviba me Godɨn ofa gamir gumazibar otifi. Ezɨ Moses Osirizir Araziba ghaze, Israelian gumaziba, me uan biziba 10plan pozibar da tuiraghtɨ, Livain gumaziba me da pozitam iniam. Livaiba me uaghan Israelian marasi. Egha me uaghan Abrahamɨn ovaviba. Ezɨ Israelia uan biziba tuiragha maba isa uan marazigh anɨngizɨ me da ini.
